title: Instructional Design for Enhancing Teacher Competencies Through Educational Technology Course Improvements

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Social sector job competency enhancement program for in-service professionals, offering asynchronous learning environments using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more ethical issues that may arise when utilizing educational technology tools and propose solutions.
Learners can complete a digital content production project using collaboration tools within an LMS.
Learners can design a real-time feedback system (quizzes/surveys) to enhance learner engagement by at least 20%.

resources: LMS Platforms (Zoom Webinar, Google Classroom, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
